name: Eternal Chicken
description:
A challenging chicken themed game that's hard to beat. Flap left and right to make your chicken fly.

How to play: move the cursor to left or right side of the screen and click primary mouse button to control the chicken's movements.

NOTE: This game was created alone by Erwin Artha, including background and character design except music and font. Almost all music in this game is CC0 licensed.

I will happily accept donation as a token of gratitude and appreciation for what I've made. Feel free to play this game! ^^
